Top in soft viscose jersey with short puff sleeves.

Knitted biker jacket in soft bouclé made from a wool blend. Notch lapels with press-studs, shoulder tabs with press-studs and a diagonal zip down the front. Chest pocket, zipped side pockets, a small flap front pocket with a press-stud, and one inner pocket. Zips at the cuffs and loops at the hem. Lined.
Imitation suede jacket with a lined hood, draped lapels and diagonal zip at the front. Side pockets and one zipped sleeve pocket. Pile lining.
Court shoes in imitation suede with peep toes and open sides. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Satin sandals with square toes, a toe loop and lacing at the front with long straps that tie around the leg. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket in a felted weave with a lined hood and zip with a pendant at the front. Welt side pockets, a zipped sleeve pocket with a pendant and elastication at the cuffs and back of the hem. Lined.
